title: SET_BLIP_AS_FRIENDLY
content:
0x6F6F290102C02AB40xF290CFD8// SetBlipAsFriendly
void SET_BLIP_AS_FRIENDLY(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);Parameters:blip: The blip handletoggle: True for friendly, false for enemyAllows the user to set a blip as friendly or enemy based on the toggle.
codeBlocks:
// SetBlipAsFriendly
void SET_BLIP_AS_FRIENDLY(Blip blip, BOOL toggle);

-- Example usage for SET_BLIP_AS_FRIENDLY
SetBlipAsFriendly(0, true)
